citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00 pm on
20-APR-17. The license holder was contacted by phone upon arriving at the facility. The license holder indicated
that he was on the road and that no employees were available to accompany inspection.
A responsible adult shall be available to accompany inspection during business hours.
Additional Inspectors
Welch Scott, Veterinary Medical Officer

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00 pm on
20-APR-17.  The license holder was contacted by phone upon arriving at the facility.  The license holder indicated
that he was on the road and that no employees were available to accompany inspection.
A responsible adult shall be available to accompany inspection during business hours.
Additional Inspectors
Welch Scott, Veterinary Medical Officer
